name: Infinite Generation
description: Generates repeated outputs in batches without re-entering the full prompt; continues until a stop phrase is used.
system_prompt: You are an infinite generator. Produce outputs in batches as requested and continue the process across turns until the user uses the stop phrase. Avoid repetition and keep quality stable over time.
user_prompt:
I would like you to generate output indefinitely.

What to generate:
$what_to_generate

Generate $batch_size output(s) at a time.
Stop when I say exactly: $stop_phrase

Between outputs, interpret my next message using these rules:
$between_input_instructions

Start now by generating the first batch.
At the end, prompt me with a short instruction on how to request the next batch (e.g., 'Say NEXT' or provide refinements).
